item.title: Basic ETL using Python, Big Query, Data Studio & Airflow
item.author: Jonathan de Jesus Azor
item.description: ETL Diagram of my first project Extraction: API containing the crime data from Austin, Texas. Transform: Was performed in Visual Studio utilizing Pandas. Transformation: Rename of Columns Transformation: Change format of “Date Ocurred” from Military time, to standard time Transformation: Change format of “Date Reported” from Military time, to standard time Load: Data was uploaded into the data warehouse Big Query (Google Cloud Datastore). Airflow: Chosen due to popularity Aiflow documentation

item.title: Do you want to set an awesome website like this ?
item.author: Jonathan de Jesus Azor
item.description: If you want to setup/host/deploy a website on GitHub please check: Ivy’s blog.
